title: Polki & Emerald Drop Jhumka - A Timeless Sparkle
features: These stunning Jhumka earrings showcase a captivating blend of traditional Polki craftsmanship and contemporary design. The central Polki diamond, delicately set in a floral motif, radiates a unique sparkle. The vibrant green emerald bead dangles gracefully below, adding a touch of regal charm. Finished with a fine Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranti
and elegant evening events. Perfect for adding a touch of traditional glamour to any outfit.
description: The unique combination of Polki diamonds and vibrant emeralds creates a striking visual appeal. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine and durability. These earrings are a testament to skilled craftsmanship, blending traditional techniques with modern sensibilities.
